author: Luis Martinez
title: Next steps in carrier saga could include reinstatement of fired captain
description: The Navy's top admiral is considering the next steps in the saga of the USS Theodore Roosevelt, including possible reinstatement of the fired ship's captain.
content:
Two weeks after the firing of the captain of the aircraft carrier USS Theodore Roosevelt, the Navy's top admiral is mulling the next steps in the ship's saga that, among other things, could include the possible reinstatement of Capt. Brett Crozier.
Adm. Mike… [+4747 chars]
